name: Cube Memory
description:
Description

The game's setting theme was chosen as a Fun Casual Memory Game with an enchanting simple character, the planned gameplay behind Cube Memory was structured as a simple movement-based jumping game where the player has to move the jumping character onto platforms without missing otherwise the game resets

 The element of memory in the game was coloured platforms that the player has to remember to which after the player has memorised the coloured platform.

 The player waits for the checkpoint which is also on a platform, and the checkpoint gives a pop-up telling the player what colour they saw last on the platform if the player picks correctly, the player gets a point boost.

If the player does not get the colour correct, the boost will not be attained, to add on, the difficulty of the game is progressively increased as the player reaches further and further platforms as it progresses. 

Features

Unique gameplay

  •  Tilt & drag input
  •  Endless spawning
  •  Start, pause & game over panels
  •  Score and high score system

I hope you enjoy the game, please leave feedback in the comments, all is appreciated
